tasks.label: build_all
tasks.command: source device/milkv-duo256m/boardconfig.sh && source build/milkvsetup.sh && defconfig cv1812cp_milkv_duo256m_sd && build_all

tasks.label: build_uboot
tasks.command: source device/milkv-duo256m/boardconfig.sh && source build/milkvsetup.sh && defconfig cv1812cp_milkv_duo256m_sd && build_uboot

tasks.label: build_kernel
tasks.command: source device/milkv-duo256m/boardconfig.sh && source build/milkvsetup.sh && defconfig cv1812cp_milkv_duo256m_sd && build_kernel
